metadata.title: Bower XPDNEL3E Digital Camera Battery Replaces Nikon EN-EL3
features: Provides excellent battery life and boasts 7.2V and 2800 mAh
100% memory-free for easy charging at any energy level
Can be used with original lithium-ion battery charger
description: This digital camera battery replaces the Nikon EN-EL3. It provides excellent battery life and boasts 7.2V and 2800 mAh. It fits these camera models: Nikon D50, D70, D70s, D100, D100 SLR
